programme.title: Snake City: Snakes In The City Venomous Face-Off Compilation
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux are amazed by the respect Indian locals have for their venomous scaled neighbors. The calls are pouring in, and Snake Shyam helps rescue a deadly Russell‚Äôs viper tangled in netting. Shyam‚Äôs son, Surya, is breaking concrete steps to help Simon and Sioux finally capture a rat snake. Then, the duo teams with Gowri Shanker to catch and release not one but two enormous king cobras.

programme.title: Snake City: Snakes In The City Venomous Face-Off Compilation
programme.desc: A dangerous heatwave surges across India, which means more deadly snakes are on the move looking for shelter. Simon and Sioux join Snake Shyam and Gowri Shanker to battle the heat and rescue hiding snakes. The team tries to rescue a spectacled cobra from a water pit and a deadly Russell‚Äôs viper hiding in a bookstore. For the first time in 30 years, Simon tails and rescues a king cobra by himself!.

programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Black mambas are one of the most feared snakes on the planet. But behind the twitchy demeanour and lightning-fast strike is a shy and highly intelligent creature, just trying to get through the hot, snakey summer alive. This legendary serpent has a plethora of assets - venom, agility, speed and sensory superpowers - that make it a master its habitat, despite being the most hated serpent in Africa.

programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Vipers are one of the most feared snake families in the world. Now their stories reveal just how troubled life can be for hated snakes. Rattlesnakes in the desert cheat death by predators and people. Puffadders clean up vermin, yet face persecution. And gaboon vipers on the forest floor dare not move. This is an intimate look at their challenges and how they overcome each with unique superpowers.

programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Charmed by some, feared by most ‚Äì the cobra family is powerful and iconic. From giant cannibalistic king cobras in India, to desert specialists that hunt birds in the Kalahari and semi aquatic Forest cobras stalking toads in African swamps, each one has a unique story and set of challenges to overcome.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol: Compilation
programme.desc: Summer heat requires Dr. Pol to pivot his approach while treating a sick cow. A Great Dane and a thirty-year-old horse fall victim to icy ground. Dr. Brenda aids in a complicated springtime calving. From frigid temperatures to a sweltering sun, from muddy pens to dusty pastures, the conditions that Mother Nature creates in central Michigan for both animals and vets is a force to be reckoned with.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: A major storm blows into Central Michigan, and as the snow piles up, so do the cases! While clients brave the weather to get care for their animals, Dr. Pol and Charles battle thundersnow when responding to an emergency farm call. Dr. Lisa needs ten stitches to repair a horses deep cut, and Dr. Brenda treats a Rottweilers very swollen face. .

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: In this episode, we expose how some of the most deadly battles are fought amongst the same species, as well as between predator and prey. .

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: From African plains to the snow-covered wilds of North America, we reveal how nature's deadliest battles are fought over turf, and dominance.
